title: Having problems with my phone battery again
content: Hi, I bought my Pixel 4XL last November. I was having battery problems. My ohone wouldn't charge properly, the charger would keep popping out and thr battery would fie pretty fast. After contacting you, you dent me a brand nee phone but now a few months later im having the same problems!!!
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 4 XL
